Tunable.name: caught_cheating_loot
Tunable.description: Loot action applied on a sim who has been caught cheating on homework. It is applied at the time that homework is processed.

Tunable.name: end_of_course_loot
Tunable.description: Loot action applied on a sim when all work has been completed for a course.

TunableVariant.name: prelecture_affordance
TunableVariant.description: The affordance that is pushed onto the Sim prior to going to class.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The affordance that is pushed onto the Sim prior to going to class.

Tunable.name: successful_cheating_loot
Tunable.description: Loot action applied on a sim who has cheated on homework but was not caught. It is applied at the time that homework is processed.

TunableVariant.name: work_early_affordance
TunableVariant.description: The affordance that is pushed onto the Sim when the user clicks the go to work button between start of work and early warning.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The affordance that is pushed onto the Sim when the user clicks the go to work button between start of work and early warning.
